page.title: 03A TEENAGE GIRL'S TYPICAL DAY
page.content: I get up at 7.30. I dress, wash and put on my make-up, this takes me until 8.15. I then go downstairs and have breakfast, which consists of toast and a cup of tea.This is all I have time for in the mad morning rush. I then brush my teeth and do my hair before I leave in my father's car for school. We have 6 lessons a day at{Kingsdown, which is the Comprehensive school that I attend. School ends at 3.45 and I have to walk home. I get home at about 5.00 p.m. I first get my school bag ready for the next day, and do my homework. After this I get changed and have my tea. In the evening I either watch T.V. or go out. In Swindon the main event of the week is to go to the {Brunel Rooms}on Wednesday nights with several friends to dance to a disco. I usually go to bed at 11.00.
